call: /home/agalvezm/anaconda3/bin/kb count -i index.idx -g t2g.txt -x 10xv2 -o out/ --filter bustools fastqs/CRR126647_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126647_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126648_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126648_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126649_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126649_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126650_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126650_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126651_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126651_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126652_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126652_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126653_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126653_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126654_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126654_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126655_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126655_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126656_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126656_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126657_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126657_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126658_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126658_r2.fastq.gz
commands: kallisto bus -i index.idx -o out/ -x 10xv2 -t 8 fastqs/CRR126647_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126647_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126648_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126648_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126649_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126649_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126650_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126650_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126651_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126651_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126652_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126652_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126653_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126653_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126654_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126654_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126655_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126655_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126656_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126656_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126657_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126657_r2.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126658_f1.fastq.gz fastqs/CRR126658_r2.fastq.gz
